zh.title: Solana/美元技术分析：[短期回调中维持强势]
zh.content:
当前SOL/USD价格为134.38，较24小时前上涨1.63%。从高点135.06和低点131.29的波动来看，市场呈现出一定的整理态势。短期内，SOL可能面临回调压力，但整体趋势仍然强劲，投资者应保持关注。

在技术指标方面，MACD显示出负值（-1.95671），表明短期内可能存在卖压，而SMA(20)为135.189，显示出短期均线的支撑作用。由于RSI数据缺失，难以全面评估超买或超卖状态，但MACD的表现提示投资者需谨慎。

支撑位方面，131.29是关键的支撑区域，如果价格跌破该水平，可能会引发更大幅度的调整。反之，135.06则是重要的阻力位，突破该点位将有助于价格进一步上涨。投资者应密切关注这两个关键价位的动态。

建议投资者在当前价格附近保持观望，若价格回调至支撑位131.29附近时可考虑适量建仓，若突破阻力位135.06则可考虑加仓。保持灵活的交易策略，以应对市场的快速变化。

en.title: Solana vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
The current price of Solana (SOL) at $134.38 reflects a modest 1.63% increase over the past 24 hours, indicating a slight bullish momentum. Analyzing the recent price action, SOL has established a resistance level at $135.06, which aligns closely with the upper range of the daily high. Conversely, the support level appears at $131.29, suggesting that if the price retraces, it could find buying interest around this area. Traders should watch these levels closely, as they may provide opportunities for entry or exit.

The absence of a current RSI value limits our ability to gauge overbought or oversold conditions, but the MACD reading of -1.95671 indicates a bearish trend. This suggests that sellers have been more influential recently, although the market could be nearing a potential reversal if bullish momentum builds. Monitoring the MACD closely for crossovers may provide valuable insights into future price movements, particularly when combined with other indicators.

With the 20-day Simple Moving Average (SMA) at $135.19, the price is nearing this moving average, which often acts as a dynamic resistance. If the price can break above this SMA and maintain momentum, it may attract further buying interest and push the asset toward the next resistance level. Conversely, a failure to break this level could lead traders to reassess their positions, potentially leading to a downward correction.

In terms of trading strategy, traders might consider entering long positions if SOL breaks above $135.06 with strong volume, targeting higher resistance levels. Conversely, if the price approaches the support level of $131.29, it may be wise to set stop-loss orders to mitigate potential losses. Keeping an eye on broader market trends and sentiment will further enhance the effectiveness of these strategies.
